languages.text: [Обвести рукой зал] "Дело не в том чья идея, а в том ради кого мы это затеваем. Ради них, жителей Футфола. Ради тебя, Октавиана. Ради вашей свободы от террора безумной фанатички".

[Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."
languages.original_text: [Обвести рукой зал] "Дело не в том чья идея, а в том ради кого мы это затеваем. Ради них, жителей Футфола. Ради тебя, Октавиана. Ради вашей свободы от террора безумной фанатички".

traits.locale_text: [Point to the people in the hall with a sweeping gesture] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For these people. Footfallers. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

[Point to the people in the hall with a sweeping gesture] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For these people. Footfallers. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

[Point to the people in the hall with a sweeping gesture] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the Footfallers. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

[Point to the people in the hall with a sweeping gesture] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the Footfallers. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

[Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

[Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

languages.text: [指着房间里所有人]“重点不在于是谁的主意，而在于为了谁。我们这么做是为了落脚港的所有人，也是为了你，奥克塔维娜。这么做，是为了让你们重获自由，不再屈从于那个疯子的恐怖统治。”
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

traits.locale_text: [对大厅里所有人做个手势]“重点不在于是谁的主意，而在于为了谁。我们这么做是为了落脚港的所有人，也是为了你，奥克塔维娜。这么做，是为了让你们重获自由，不再屈从于那个疯子的恐怖统治。”

languages.text: [腕を一振りして部屋にいる人々にジェスチャーをする]「誰の提案かは重要ではない。誰の為に実行するのかが大事なんだ。フットフォールの人々の為。お前、オクタヴィアナの為。狂信的な狂信者の恐怖支配からの解放される為に」
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

traits.locale_text: [腕を一振りして部屋にいる人々にジェスチャーをする]「誰の提案かは重要ではない。誰の為に実行するのかが大事なんだ。フットフォールの人々の為。お前、オクタヴィアナの為。狂信的な狂信者の恐怖支配からの解放される為に」

languages.text: [Señalar a la gente de la sala con un gesto amplio] «No se trata de dónde sale la idea, sino de por quién lo hacemos. Por la gente de Paso. Por ti, Octaviana. Para que se libere de un reinado de terror».
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

traits.locale_text: [Señalar a la gente de la sala] «No se trata de dónde sale la idea, sino de por quién lo hacemos. Por la gente de Paso. Por ti, Octaviana. Para que se libere de un reinado de terror».

languages.text: [Mit einer ausschweifenden Geste auf die Leute in der Halle deuten] "Es geht nicht darum, wessen Idee es ist, sondern für wen wir es tun. Für die Leute auf Footfall. Für Euch, Octaviana. Für Eure Freiheit von der Schreckensherrschaft einer wahnsinnigen Fanatikerin."
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

traits.locale_text: [Mit einer ausschweifenden Geste auf die Leute in der Halle deuten] "Es geht nicht darum, wessen Idee es ist, sondern für wen wir es tun. Für die Leute auf Footfall. Für Euch, Octaviana. Für Eure Freiheit von der Schreckensherrschaft einer wahnsinnigen Fanatikerin."

languages.text: [Montrer les autres gens dans la salle d'un grand geste] « L'important n'est pas de savoir de qui vient l'idée, mais pour qui nous le faisons. Pour les habitants de Castel. Pour vous, Octaviana. Pour vous libérer du règne de terreur de cette fanatique sanguinaire. »
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."

traits.locale_text: [Montrer les autres gens dans la salle d'un grand geste] « L'important n'est pas de savoir de qui vient l'idée, mais pour qui nous le faisons. Pour les habitants de Castel. Pour vous, Octaviana. Pour vous libérer du règne de terreur de cette fanatique sanguinaire. »

languages.text: [Kolunu uzatıp mekândaki insanlara işaret et] "Mühim olan fikrin kime ait olduğu değil, bu fikri kimin için uyguladığımız. Binlimanlılar için yapıyoruz bunu. Senin için yapıyoruz Octaviana. Çılgın bir bağnazın korku krallığından kurtulun diye yapıyoruz."
languages.original_text: [Gesture at the people in the room with a sweep of your arm] "This is not about whose idea it is, but who we are doing it for. For the people on Footfall. For you, Octaviana. For your freedom from an insane zealot's reign of terror."
